hi: on my ubunut 8.10 and i815 chipset, i get the following in dmesg: [drm:drm_fill_in_dev] *ERROR* Cannot initialize the agpgart module.
That would be related to your AGP-based graphics card.
I found traces of your situation at http://www.gossamer-threads.com/lists/linux/kernel/949302
I can't understand that topic.. it's too kernel developers specific
Did you build a custom kernel or are you using a vanilla one from the distribution?
You don't need to do that much. Open a terminal, then type "sudo modprobe intel-agp". If the module loads with no issues, you can restart X with ctrl-alt-backspace.
